body.name: A Race Unchanged
body.body: Elves remained largely unchanged from their Faerun counterparts once created on Dekatreis. Still long-lived and slow-paced, letting humans build empires while they sit back and admire their long lifespans, many elves turn to adventure to find purpose or to serve their people.

body.name: Age
body.body: Although elves reach physical maturity at about the sam e age as humans, the elven understanding of adulthood goes beyond physical growth to encompass worldly experience. An elf typically claims adulthood and an adult name around the age of 100 and can live to be 750 years old.

body.name: Alignment
body.body: Elves love freedom , variety, and self-expression, so they lean strongly toward the gentler aspects of chaos. They value and protect others' freedom as well as their own, and they are more often good than not. Though Drow do not commonly exist on Dekatreis, the Dark Elves were tainted by the Drow King's ill intent, and widespread fear forced them into hiding, some turning to resent society and others wishing to prove their good intentions.

body.name: Size
body.body: Elves range from under 5 to over 6 feet tall and have slender builds. Your size is Medium

body.name: Speed
body.body: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

body.name: Low-Light Vision
body.body: Accustomed to the twilight of forests, most elves gain the ability to see well in areas of dim light. You gain the ability to see in areas of dim light as if it were bright light.

body.name: Keen Senses
body.body: You have proficiency in the Perception skill.

body.name: Fey Ancestry
body.body: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.

body.name: Trance
body.body: Elves do not sleep. Instead they meditate deeply, remaining semi-conscious, for 4 hours a day. The Common word for this meditation is "trance". While meditating, you dream after a fashion; such dreams are actually mental exercises that have become reflexive after years of practice. After resting in this way, you gain the same benefit a human would from 8 hours of sleep.

body.name: Languages
body.body: You can speak, read, and write Common and Elven.

body.name: Elf Weapon Training
body.body: You have proficiency with the longsword, shortsword, shortbow, and longbow.

body.name: Fleet of Foot
body.body: Your base walking speed increases to 35 feet.

body.name: Mask of the Wild
body.body: You can attempt to hide even when you are only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.
